attributes.action: Request the Japanese Government to stop the Capture and slaughter of Dolphins in Japanese waters
attributes.additional_details: Every year 20,000 Dolphins, porpoises and small whales are slaughtered or taken into captivity in Japanese waters, including the notorious Taiji Cove.  These dolphins are migrating past Japan, and do not live in these waters. We call on HM Government to request that the Japanese government put and end to this barbaric practice.
